metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19447 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted ext4 filesystem image, performing some operations, and unmounting can lead to a use-after-free in ext4_put_super in fs/ext4/super.c, related to dump_orphan_list in fs/ext4/super.c.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Exploiting this vulnerability requires a crafted filesystem image to be mounted

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
